sense.gloss: to confide, to reveal, to disclose, to lay bare, to speak frankly, to open (one's heart)

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はすべてのことを↑打↑↓|う↓ち↑明↑↓あ↓ける|ほうがよい。
sdata.e: You had better make a clean breast of everything.

sdata.j: あなたにはもっと↑早↑↓はや↓く↑全↑↓すべ↓てを↑打↑↓|う↓ち↑明↑↓あ↓ける|べきだった。
sdata.e: I should have told you everything earlier.

sdata.e: She was reluctant to reveal her secret.

sdata.e: It took Tom every ounce of courage he had to admit to Mary that he had once been part of a terrorist group.
